annotator_notes: Three behaviors: iman (inner), salah (physical), infaq (relational) = mixed
Iman and yaqin are inner cognitive/spiritual states
Huda and falah describe spiritual states/outcomes
yaqulu - explicit speech act of false claim
Khida'a (deception) is relational - involves others
Marad fi qulubihim - disease in hearts = inner state
Birr encompasses giving to others - primarily relational
Anfiquu - command to spend, ihsan - physical/relational
Anfiquu min tayyibat - command to give from good earnings
Ya'kuluna al-riba - consuming usury is physical economic act
Ittaqu rabbakum - taqwa is inner spiritual state
La yahillu - prohibition of inheriting women against will
La ta'kulu amwalakum bil-batil - prohibition of consuming wealth wrongly
Worship (physical) + ihsan to parents/neighbors (relational) = mixed
Tu'addu al-amanat - returning trusts is relational
Tahiyyah - greeting is speech act
Qawwamin bil-qist shuhada - standing for justice is relational
Deception (relational) + lazy prayer (physical) + riya (inner) = mixed
Describes state/consequence of hypocrisy
Al-jahr bil-su' min al-qawl - public evil speech
Ta'awanu 'ala al-birr - cooperation is relational
Qawwamin lillah shuhada bil-qist - justice is relational
Qatl nafs - killing is physical act
Sariq - theft is physical act, punishment commanded
Love (inner) + jihad (physical) + humility/strength (trait) = mixed
La tuharrimu tayyibat - prohibition of forbidding lawful things
Fajtanibuhu - command to avoid intoxicants (physical abstention)
Taqwa (inner) + iman (inner) + ihsan (relational) = mixed
Fattaqu Allah - taqwa command, inner spiritual state
'Alaykum anfusakum - focus on self-guidance
La tuqaddimu - not putting oneself before Allah/Rasul is relational etiquette
La tarfa'u aswatakum - raising voice is speech act
Fatabayyanu - verification of news is relational responsibility
Fa'aslihu baynahuma - reconciliation is relational
Aslihu bayna akhawaykum - brotherhood reconciliation
La yaskhar, la talmizu, la tanabazu - mockery/insults are speech acts
La tajassasu, la yaghtab - spying/backbiting are speech-related
Li-ta'arafu - mutual recognition is relational
Qalat al-a'rab amanna - false claim of faith is speech act
Iman (inner) + no doubt (inner) + jihad (physical) = mixed
Qalu nashadu - false testimony is speech act
Ittakhadu aymanahum junnah - using oaths as shield is speech act
Tubi'a 'ala qulubihim - sealed hearts = inner state
Yahsabuna kulla sayhatin - paranoid inner state
Lawwaw ru'usahum - turning heads away is physical gesture
Yaquluna la tunfiqu - speech discouraging charity
La tulhikum - being distracted from dhikr is inner state
Anfiqu - command to spend is physical act
Death comes - informative about inevitable physical event
La tadkhulu buyutan - entering homes without permission is physical
